section.title: Your contribution is important!
section.para: We would like to improve the quality of this guide and provide more translation in your mother tongue. Your help is always welcome.

If you want to help with its translation, or if you have any comments, a typographical correction or an article submission which you would like to see included in this guide, you can post a message in Salix Documentation forum or write to: salix-main@lists.sourceforge.net
